H0.text: Who takes over the important position of Governor of the Bank of England in 2013 . Mervyn King

H1.text: Who takes over the important position of Governor of the Bank of England in 2013 . Lord Adair Turner

H2.text: Who takes over the important position of Governor of the Bank of England in 2013 . Paul Tucker

H3.text: Who takes over the important position of Governor of the Bank of England in 2013 . MARK CARNEY

A4.text: On November 26, 2012, Chancellor of the Exchequer George Osborne announced the appointment of Carney as Governor of the Bank of England.

A5.text: He succeeded Sir Mervyn King on July 1, 2013.
